ruleset.name: Apex Structure Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code structure and organization

rule.name: NoUnnecessaryAttributeVariables
rule.message: Never create a variable for a class attribute that is only used once and never reassigned
rule.description: Variables that extract a single attribute from an object and are only used once should be inlined. This rule does not apply to collection types (List, Set, Map) or object/class instances, only primitive types.
